title: Technological Infrastructure of Institutional Capture Networks
description: Comprehensive analysis revealing the systematic use of advanced technological infrastructure to facilitate institutional capture. Specific mechanisms include AI-driven personnel selection algorithms, predictive analytics for identifying ideologically aligned candidates, and digital surveillance technologies that enable precise institutional transformation.
research_objectives: Map predictive analytics in institutional transformation
Understand strategic positioning in governance structures
key_actors: Center for Technology and Democracy, Georgetown University
Harvard Berkman Klein Center for Internet & Society
